atk-abh03a19:2_0: 387. Idāni gihissa arahāti kathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ yasakulaputtādīnaṁ gihibyañjane
atk-abh03a19:2_1: ṭhitānaṁ arahattappattiṁ disvā ‘‘gihi assa arahā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a19:2_2: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha gihissāti yo gihisaṁyojanasampayuttatāya gihi,
atk-abh03a19:2_3: so arahaṁ assāti attho. Paravādī pana adhippāyaṁ asallakkhetvā gihibyañjanamattameva
atk-abh03a19:2_4: passanto paṭijānāti. Idānissa ‘‘gihi nāma gihisaṁyojanena hoti, na byañjanamattena. Yathāha bhagavā –
atk-abh03a19:6: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū’’’ti. (dha. pa. 142);
atk-abh03a19:7: Imaṁ nayaṁ dassetuṁ atthi arahatotiādi āraddhaṁ. Taṁ sabbaṁ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a19:10_0: 388. Idāni upapattikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘opapātiko hoti tatthaparinibbāyī’’tivacanāni
atk-abh03a19:10_1: (pu. pa. 35-40) ayoniso gahetvā suddhāvāsesu upapattiyā arahāti laddhi, ‘‘yesaṁ vā
atk-abh03a19:10_3: saha upapattiyā arahā hotīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṁ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a19:10_4: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tattha yasmā upapatticittaṁ nāma lokiyaṁ, tena
atk-abh03a19:10_5: sotāpannādayopi na honti, pageva arahā. Tasmāssa imaṁ nayaṁ dassetuṁ saha upapattiyā
atk-abh03a19:11: 389.Sāriputtotiādi imesu mahātheresu ko ekopi saha upapattiyā arahā nāmāti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a19:12: 390.Upapattesiyenāti paṭisandhicittena. Tañhi upapattiṁ esati gavesati, tasmā upapattesiyanti vuccati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a19:15_0: 391. Idāni anāsavakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ye dhammā anāsavassa arahato, sabbe te
atk-abh03a19:15_1: anāsavāti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṁ; te sandhāya arahatoti
atk-abh03a19:15_2: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ anāsavā nāma maggādayo, kiṁ tassa
atk-abh03a19:15_3: teyeva uppajjantīti codanatthaṁ maggo phalantiādi āraddhaṁ. Cakkhu anāsavanti puṭṭho
atk-abh03a19:15_4: tassa sāsavattā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho anāsavassetanti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a19:16_0: 392. Cīvarapañhe ekova dhammo anāsavo sāsavo ca hotīti lakkhaṇavirodhabhayā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a19:16_1: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho anāsavassa hutvā sāsavassa hotīti paṭijānāti. Taññeva anāsavanti pañhādvayepi
atk-abh03a19:16_2: eseva nayo. Sakavādī pana taññevāti anuññātattā ‘‘maggo anāsavo hutvā’’tiādīhi codeti.
atk-abh03a19:19_0: 393. Idāni samannāgatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha dve samannāgamā paccuppannakkhaṇe samaṅgībhāvasamannāgamo
atk-abh03a19:19_1: ca rūpāvacarādīsu aññatarabhūmippattito paṭilābhasamannāgamo ca. So yāva adhigatavisesā
atk-abh03a19:19_2: na parihāyati, tāvadeva labbhati. Yesaṁ pana ṭhapetvā ime dve samannāgame añño upapattidhammavasena
atk-abh03a19:19_3: eko samannāgamo nāma hotīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṁ, tesaṁ pattidhammo
atk-abh03a19:19_4: nāma koci natthīti anubodhanatthaṁ arahā catūhi phalehi samannāgatoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a19:19_5: pattiṁ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa. Athassa ‘‘yadi te arahā catūhi khandhehi viya catūhi
atk-abh03a19:19_6: phalehi samannāgato, evaṁ sante ye catūsu phalesu cattāro phassādayo, tehi te arahato
atk-abh03a19:19_7: samannāgatatā pāpuṇātī’’ti codanatthaṁ arahā catūhi phassehītiādi āraddhaṁ. Taṁ sabbaṁ
atk-abh03a19:19_8: paravādinā ekakkhaṇe catunnaṁ phassādīnaṁ abhāvā paṭikkhittaṁ. Anāgāmipañhādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a19:20_0: 395.Sotāpattiphalaṁ vītivattoti na paṭhamajjhānaṁ viya dutiyajjhānalābhī; puna anuppattiyā
atk-abh03a19:20_1: pana vītivattoti pucchati. Sotāpattimaggantiādi yaṁ vītivatto, tenassa puna asamannāgamaṁ dassetuṁ āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a19:21_0: 396.Tehi ca aparihīnoti pañhe yasmā yathā paccanīkasamudācārena lokiyajjhānadhammā
atk-abh03a19:21_1: parihāyanti, na evaṁ lokuttarā. Maggena hi ye kilesā pahīyanti, phalena ca paṭippassambhanti,
atk-abh03a19:21_2: te tathā pahīnāva tathā paṭippassaddhāyeva ca honti, tasmā sakavādinā āmantāti paṭiññātaṁ.
atk-abh03a19:21_3: Svāyamattho parato ‘‘arahatā cattāro maggā paṭiladdhā’’tiādīsu pakāsitoyeva. Sesaṁ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a19:24_0: 397.Arahāchahi upekkhāhīti kathāyapi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Arahā hi chasu
atk-abh03a19:24_1: dvāresu upekkhānaṁ uppattibhabbatāya tāhi samannāgatoti vuccati, na ekakkhaṇe sabbāsaṁ uppattibhāvenāti.
atk-abh03a19:27_0: 398. Idāni bodhiyā buddhotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha bodhīti catumaggañāṇassāpi sabbaññutaññāṇassāpi
atk-abh03a19:27_1: adhivacanaṁ. Tasmā yesaṁ yathā odātena vaṇṇena odāto, sāmena vaṇṇena sāmo, evaṁ bodhiyā
atk-abh03a19:27_2: buddhoti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṁyeva; te sandhāya pucchā ca anuyogo
atk-abh03a19:27_3: ca sakavādissa, paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca itarassa.
atk-abh03a19:28_0: Atītāyāti pañhe tasmiṁ khaṇe abhāvato paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho paṭilābhaṁ sandhāya
atk-abh03a19:28_1: paṭijānāti. Puna kiccavasena puṭṭho kiccābhāvato paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho yaṁ
atk-abh03a19:28_2: tena tāya karaṇīyaṁ kataṁ, tattha sammohābhāvaṁ paṭijānāti. Lesokāsaṁ pana adatvā
atk-abh03a19:28_3: dukkhaṁ parijānātītiādinā nayena puṭṭho tassa kiccassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a19:29_0: Anāgatapañhe tasmiṁ khaṇe maggañāṇassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho ‘‘agamā
atk-abh03a19:29_1: rājagahaṁ buddho’’ti (su. ni. 410) anāgatāya bodhiyā buddhabhāvaṁ maññamāno paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a19:29_2: Bodhikaraṇīyaṁ karotīti puṭṭho tasmiṁ khaṇe kiccābhāvena paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho
atk-abh03a19:29_3: yadi na kareyya, buddhoti na vucceyya. Yasmā avassaṁ karissati, tasmā karotiyeva
atk-abh03a19:29_4: nāmāti paṭijānāti. Puna lesokāsaṁ adatvā puṭṭho paṭikkhipati. Paccuppannapañho saddhiṁ
atk-abh03a19:30_0: 399. Tisso bodhiyo ekato katvā puṭṭho sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ sandhāya tīhipi buddhoti vattabbabhāvato
atk-abh03a19:30_1: paṭijānāti. Puna tīhiti puṭṭho sabbāsaṁ ekakkhaṇe abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho
atk-abh03a19:30_2: atītānāgatapaccuppannassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa vasena paṭijānāti. Puna lesokāsaṁ adatvā
atk-abh03a19:31_0: Na battabbaṁ bodhiyāti pucchā paravādissa, bodhiyā abhāvakkhaṇe abuddhabhāvāpattito
atk-abh03a19:31_1: paṭiññā sakavādissa. Nanu bodhipaṭilābhāti pañhe pana yasmiṁ santāne bodhisaṅkhātaṁ
atk-abh03a19:31_2: maggañāṇaṁ uppannaṁ, tattha buddhoti sammutisabbhāvato paṭiññā tasseva. Tassa adhippāyaṁ
atk-abh03a19:31_3: ajānitvā hañcīti laddhiṭṭhapanā paravādissa. Idānissa asallakkhaṇaṁ pākaṭaṁ kātuṁ
atk-abh03a19:31_4: bodhipaṭilābhā buddhoti bodhiyā buddhoti pucchā sakavādissa. Tassattho – ‘‘kiṁ te
atk-abh03a19:31_5: yasmā bodhipaṭilābhā buddho, tasmā bodhiyā buddho’’ti. Itaro ‘‘bodhipaṭilābho nāma
atk-abh03a19:31_6: bodhiyā uppajjitvā niruddhāyapi santāne uppannabhāvoyeva. Bodhi nāma maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a19:31_7: ñāṇa’’nti imaṁ vibhāgaṁ asallakkhentova puna paṭijānāti. Tato sakavādinā bodhipaṭilābhā
atk-abh03a19:35_0: 400. Idāni lakkhaṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva
atk-abh03a19:35_1: gatiyo bhavantī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.258) imaṁ suttaṁ ayoniso gahetvā lakkhaṇasamannāgato
atk-abh03a19:35_2: bodhisattova hotīti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṁ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a19:36: Cakkavattisattoti pañhesu yasmā cakkavattī sattopi ca bodhisattopi, tasmā abodhisattaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Bodhisattaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a19:37: 402.Dvattiṁsimānītisuttaṁ bodhisattameva sandhāya vuttaṁ. So hi pacchime bhave buddho hoti, itaresu cakkavattī, tasmā ābhatampi anābhatasadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a19:40_0: 403. Idāni niyāmokkantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ ghaṭikārasutte jotipālassa pabbajjaṁ
atk-abh03a19:40_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya bodhisattoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a19:40_3: laddhiyaṁ ṭhatvā paṭiññā itarassa. Tato yasmā niyāmoti vā brahmacariyanti vā ariyamaggassa
atk-abh03a19:40_4: nāmaṁ, bodhisattānañca ṭhapetvā pāramīpūraṇaṁ aññā niyāmokkanti nāma natthi. Yadi
atk-abh03a19:40_5: bhaveyya, bodhisatto sotāpanno sāvako bhaveyya. Na cetamevaṁ. Kevalañhi naṁ buddhā
atk-abh03a19:40_6: attano ñāṇabale ṭhatvā – ‘‘ayaṁ buddho bhavissatī’’ti byākaronti, tasmā puna bodhisattoti
atk-abh03a19:40_7: anuyogo sakavādissa. Pacchimabhavaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhepo itarassa. Dutiyapañhe jotipālakālaṁ
atk-abh03a19:40_8: sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva. Sāvako hutvātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Anussaviyoti anussavena
atk-abh03a19:40_9: paṭividdhadhammo. Pacchimabhavaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā jotipālakāle anussavaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a19:41: 404.Aññaṁ satthārantiāḷārañca rāmaputtañca sandhāya vuttaṁ. Āyasmā ānandotiādi ‘‘okkantaniyāmāva sāvakā honti, na itare okkantaniyāmā evarūpā hontī’’ti dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a19:42_0: Sāvako jātiṁ vītivattoti yāya jātiyā sāvako, taṁ vītivatto aññasmiṁ bhave asāvako
atk-abh03a19:42_1: hotīti pucchati. Itaro sotāpannādīnaṁ sotāpannādisāvakabhāvato paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a19:45_0: 406. Idāni aparāpi samannāgatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘catutthamaggaṭṭho puggalo
atk-abh03a19:45_1: pattidhammavasena tīhi phalehi samannāgato’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ
atk-abh03a19:45_2: ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha heṭṭhā catūhi phalehi
atk-abh03a19:48_0: 413. Idāni saṁyojanappahānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘nippariyāyeneva sabbasaṁyojanappahānaṁ
atk-abh03a19:48_1: arahatta’’nti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a19:48_2: paṭiññā itarassa. Puna sabbe saṁyojanāti puṭṭho heṭṭhā vuttamaggattayena pahīne sandhāya
atk-abh03a19:48_3: paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho tena maggena appahīnassa abhāvā paṭijānāti. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīsupi
atk-abh03a19:48_4: paṭhamamaggena pahīnabhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, catutthamaggena anavasesappahānaṁ
